snippet.title: Enigmata 2: Genu's Revenge - Boss: Demenus [HD]
snippet.description:
Next boss: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WbxdH568vJ4&feature=youtu.be
Previous boss: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kye7tlBtWgc
Click "show more" for more information!

Before I went to this boss, I replayed some other levels to earn gold until I have enough to get "INFINITE bonus" from the shop. I was also lucky because, I found the Legendary Key and a Blue Laser bonus which made me very prepared for this fight.

Boss guide:
His ship has a lot more armor/hp than Clade's. Try not to go in front of Demenus' ship; he can shoot fast-firing laser beams that can completely destroy you if you do not use any skill that makes you invulnerable for a period of time. As you can see on 0:53, "Stop Time" saved me from that attack!

Played, recorded, & edited by Shadelord345 (SL345)

If you haven't played the game yet, you can play it for free here at these links: 
Kongregate: http://www.kongregate.com/games/kidgamez/enigmata-2-genus-revenge
Newgrounds: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/531743
